com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.layouts

Class PrimitivePositionalLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.BasicAbstractDrawable<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
      • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.layouts.BasicAbstractLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
        • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.layouts.PrimitivePositionalLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
  • Type Parameters:
    Rend - The renderer type that performs the drawing of the element to the screen or anywhere else
    Pos - Vector type used to define the position and dimensions of the element
    Scalar - The type that Pos's individual components consist of (- see VectUtil )
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable<Rend,Pos>, Element, UberDrawable<Rend,Pos>, UberElement

    public class PrimitivePositionalLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
extends BasicAbstractLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
    The most basic and primitive implementation of BasicAbstractDrawable, that has the child positions set directly and doesn't apply any logic for restraining its children to not exceed the borders set to the layout.
    Author:
    MarkusSecundus
    See Also:
    Drawable, BasicAbstractLayout, BasicLinearLayout

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Pos NEUTRAL_POS
      Default position set to every children when it's added if it doesn't have position already set explicitly

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PrimitivePositionalLayout(Pos maxSize, Pos minSize, Pos prefSize, VectUtil<Pos,Scalar> posUtil)
      Uses posUtil.ZERO() as value for neutralPos.
      PrimitivePositionalLayout(Pos maxSize, Pos minSize, Pos prefSize, VectUtil<Pos,Scalar> posUtil, Pos neutralPos)
      Initialises the size behavior and children management.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected java.util.Map<Drawable<Rend,Pos>,BasicAbstractLayout.ChildPosition> MAKE_CONTAINER_FOR_CHILD_POSITIONS()
      Ensures that the child positions are stored in DefaultDict and initialized with NEUTRAL_POS
      Pos setChildPosition(Drawable<Rend,Pos> child, Pos newPos)
      Sets position for the child relative to the layout's origin.

        protected final Pos NEUTRAL_POS

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrimitivePositionalLayout

        public PrimitivePositionalLayout(Pos maxSize,
                                 Pos minSize,
                                 Pos prefSize,
                                 VectUtil<Pos,Scalar> posUtil)
        Uses posUtil.ZERO() as value for neutralPos. Initialises the size behavior and children management. Constructs the Properties associated with the size behavior of this.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - default value for maxSize Property
        minSize - default value for minSize Property
        prefSize - default value for prefSize Property
        posUtil - VectUtil for the vector type used

      • PrimitivePositionalLayout

        public PrimitivePositionalLayout(Pos maxSize,
                                 Pos minSize,
                                 Pos prefSize,
                                 VectUtil<Pos,Scalar> posUtil,
                                 Pos neutralPos)
        Initialises the size behavior and children management. Constructs the Properties associated with the size behavior of this.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - default value for maxSize Property
        minSize - default value for minSize Property
        prefSize - default value for prefSize Property
        posUtil - VectUtil for the vector type used
        neutralPos - default position set to every children when it's added if it doesn't have position already set explicitly

    • Method Detail

      • setChildPosition

        public Pos setChildPosition(Drawable<Rend,Pos> child,
                            Pos newPos)
        Sets position for the child relative to the layout's origin. The stored position will be preserved even upon child's removal.
        Overrides:
        setChildPosition in class BasicAbstractLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
        Parameters:
        child - element whose position is being set
        newPos - position realative to the layout's origin
